column4: Hi, I am a bit confused.   I just did a clean install of 7.04.    I heard that it would ask me if I wanted beryl and if I wanted proprietary drivers.  It didn't really ask me anything at all.  Am I mistaken?
Basically, I was interested in Beryl only so I could tile windows on my desktop
because it is not default in the install, if you want it, you must add it afterwards
